Document:
# CORE RULES
These rules apply at all times, including between rounds.
## ULTIMATE AUTHORITY
- [textlink="0. Admins have the final say" link="ShibaRuleUA0"]
## CORE RULES
- [textlink="1. You MUST be 18 or older to join this server." link="ShibaRuleC1"] - [textlink="2. You MUST only use English." link="ShibaRuleC2"] - [textlink="3. Don't be a dick." link="ShibaRuleC3"] - [textlink="4. Be civil in chat." link="ShibaRuleC4"] - [textlink="5. Be fun for everyone, not just yourself." link="ShibaRuleC5"] - [textlink="6. ERP is discouraged, but Sexual Content is allowed." link="ShibaRuleC6"] - [textlink="7. Do not use out of game methods to communicate with other players." link="ShibaRuleC7"] - [textlink="8. Do not attempt to evade bans." link="ShibaRuleC8"] - [textlink="9. Do not use multiple accounts, or alt accounts, and do not share accounts." link="ShibaRuleC9"] - [textlink="10. Do not abuse or ignore admin messages." link="ShibaRuleC10"] - [textlink="11. Do not threaten to ahelp other players or argue with them about rules." link="ShibaRuleC11"] - [textlink="12. Use realistic character names, and do not use names of famous people." link="ShibaRuleC12"] - [textlink="13. Do not use LOOC or OOC to share current round information." link="ShibaRuleC13"]
